dana, shila, bhawana aadi kamatahan wadamin, shasanika katayuthu kerehi mul thanak demin kriya kirima menma, sansarika wimukthiya patha thama abhyantharaya piriksa balimata da me hondama dawasa bawa mage hangimayi.dewanna wanne, maha mahinda himiyan pramukha pansiyayak piriwara bhikshun wahanselage aagamanayen, dharmadwipayak bawata pariwarthanaya wu me punchi diwayina mewara ee athitha wibhuthiya smaranaya karanne da thawath maha mahinda yugayaka, eksesath kala rataka purawasiyan lesa jiwath wime aishcharyaya bhukthi windinnan lesin wimaya.sadaham paniwidaya ragath maha mahindagamanayen pasuwa, samajayiya, aarthika, shasanika washayen rate athi wu maha punarjiwaya, dewani warata da saba lesama athwindina thawath mahinda yugayaka mudunathatama api dan pamina sitimu.
